title: Vervantis
description: Offering a comprehensive suite of secure data collection, cleansing, and energy optimization tools, this business specializes in sustainability and ESG reporting software with a focus on customized dashboards and greenhouse gas emissions management.

title: Zuno Carbon
description: This comprehensive ESG solution offers end-to-end reporting capabilities, enabling companies to measure emissions, enhance sustainability practices, and decarbonize their value chain while improving transparency and compliance with global standards.
